casebody.data:
T. Jeff SHARUM, Plaintiff in Error, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant in Error. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 10, 1924.) No. 248. F. J. Groehl, of New York City, for plaintiff in error. William Hayward, U. S. Atty., and Abraham I. Menin, Asst. U. S. Atty., both of New York City.

Before HOUGH, MANTON, and MAYER/ Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
